Here are the extracted sentences:

Equilibrium-competion experiments demonstated binding to high-affinity, high-density receptors with K<sub>D</sub> =1187 nM, B<sub>max</sub> =2229 fmol/mg protein.
In a typical preparation, binding of <sup>3</sup> H-NKA (2.5 nM) to MELM was highly specific (88±4%) and linearly dependent on the protein concentration, with significant binding detected as low as 26 μg protein/mL.
Nonspecific binding is routinely defined with 1 μM NKA.
In an initial use of this assay, the IC<sub>50</sub> measured for the standard compound L-659,877 was found to be 30 nM versus <sup>3</sup> H-NKA binding to MELM.
